reviews.review: Win.

This game has intense gore/violence including dismemberment. 
Fun game to play when you need to just destroy zombies either with a katana or explosives or whatever suits your taste.

I always come back to play it and try to get all the skin achievments when there are new maps.
The new transit map is pretty cool too. I bought nearly every dlc for this game.

Its fun to play with friends, you can play in a group of 6 max by default. 

With a number of weapons to choose from you get money each round from kills or surviving the wave.
There are different classes that you level up and each have unique perks and they include: 
-Pyro (Uses flamethrowers and firerelated weapons [I dont remember perks])
-Commando (Machineguns and abilities to see enemy health and stealthed enemies)
-Support (Shotguns and perk relates to welding doors faster or something I believe)
-Marksman (Rifles [Perks I dont remember])
-Medic (SMG's with healing capabilities)
-Demo (Explosives [Perks I dont remember])

My favorite perk is medic which I leveled up to 5 as of this review. 
I run quicker, spawn with armor and the healing is more potent so I have fun with that. 
I can take on the patriarch on some maps by myself on normal with a crossbow and it is adrenaline pumping/edge of my seat to try to survive the boss fight.

Worth!
Killing Floor is the shit :D buy it and play it :D
Fun little gem that I think a lot of people ignore, tense and exciting game. Would suggest to anyones library.

This game is awesome if you like killing zombies and co-op.  It's hard to get into at first and levelling perks can be tedious.  There's a lot to this game that you learn from experience and play time. But once you do, well, there's nothing quite like finding yourself in a competent team and seeing the patriarch go down in slow motion.  The perk system is surprisingly well thought out and the perks themselves are imaginative.  Grab a gun and go kill some zeds!

It's like any Christmas party... except adrenaline instead of eggnog... and blood instead of christmas cheer... and Santa is trying to kill you... scratch that EVERYONE is trying to kill you. But the biggest difference is that no one thinks you are crazy for playing Killing Floor in the middle of June!
Get it nao!
Specimens, big guns, gore what else would you want from a game?
This game is really fun , mindless killing of zombies and the like. It truely is a relaxing fun game.
Been playing this actively with some friends and I have to say it's been pretty good. Good co-op game and I just hope it continues to update and get more maps and weapons!
Fun and addictive co-op zombie killing with regular content updates two years later, what's not to love?
Eu  gosto do jogo, para quem curte multiplayer vale muito a pena
Este es un increible juego claro si te gusta matar zombies, es lo tuyo no te puede faltar en steam
A Wonderful Blood Lust but not all the way enough for me that is but still is a wonderful game :)
Shooter cooperativo muy entretenido.
wow hey! buy this game!

This is that kind of game that not even the bugs nor the old graphics can spoil the fun. Playing with friends is such a blast, specially when there is only one person left and everybody is cheering while he is running from the Patriarch. 
I love the fact that there is much more then just playing the game over and over. On KF you can lvl up your perks while still having lots of fun experimenting other perks.
Cool mechanics and awesome gameplay. This is one of the "not-so-famous" games that is a must-have.
Amazing coop goodness.  Fun to play with friends

Reel' heavy cake for people, who like some logical thinking before stupidly shooting.
It's not indie game, here no Marios jumping and mushrooms walking.
If you buy that, let's play with me=)

Killing floor is a game where you are dropped in the middle and forced to defend yourself against an onslaught of  "zeds". I would say that if you mixed Nation Red with Left 4 Dead, Killing Floor is what you would get. You can have six people play at once online, the levels are well made and dont feel too linear and the gunplay/ melee is a blast.  You go through waves (from four to ten) then at the end you fight a boss.

There are perks you can get but unlike other games, perks serve more as a role than a buff. For example, the berserker is great with melee weapons and damage resistance but if you want to blow something up you will get a better "boom" with the demolition perk. 

This game does have its down sides. Sometimes the game will troll you with certain zed spawns and the hit boxes can be a little funky at times. But aside from that, its very addictive and a blast to play with friends.
This game is so fun, from one round to the next each is filled with action packed excitement!
Gran juego para pasar un buen rato. Es simplemente de ir matando zombies por rondas hasta acabarlas todas.
It's one of the best designed survival games I have ever played.
Buy this game, it is good.

Killing Floor is the zombie game I keep coming back to.

Update: I bought the game in 2009. I wrote this review in 2011. Im writing an update in 2014. This game has not been uninstalled except for rebuilds of my computer. Throwing these guys some dosh during a sale is totally worth this game. Tripwire is still taking care of their customers and fans. I am waiting for KF2.
Awesome game, but I wish they would update it a little bit more often.
If you're ever in the mood to fire some weapons at zombies this will satisfy that craving. Great gun play. You can also go melee if thats your thing.
Muy bueno y entretenido sobre todo con tus colegas. Echas muy buenos ratos.

Eines der unterhaltsamsten Koop-Zombie-Spiele. Langfristige Motivation durch Klassen- und Rollensystem sowie unterschiedliche und fordernde Schwierigkeitsgrade. Laufende kostenlose Erweiterungen und Events.
Muy buen juego, para comprarselo :D

This dubious loking Left 4 Dead clone is in fact quite different from the Valve title it appears to be copying. There are 6 players to a map, much more horrible creatures to face, and strangely enough RPG elements. Each type of specialist has different skills to defeat the hordes of specimens trying to kill you because of the horrible experiments that replaced their hands with motorized meat grinders. And on top of that, it's fairly cheap, making this game well worth the price. Get it even if you have Left 4 Dead, you will not regret it.

Good game all in all though!

You are dropped in a random place on a map, where waves of creatures come to attack you. After each wave, a shop opens in a different part of the map. So you have to time to the shop carefully. You don't want to be caught out in the open when the most creatures are attacking you... unless you bought a flamethrower...  Are you sure you want to weld that door shut, or do you need to get through it later?

Start on a low difficulty setting, get the body armor at the shop, and aim for their heads.
It's a fun game that lasts awhile. Most computers can also run it. The game also has lots of people playing it so you don't have to worry about empty servers.

It is a quite simple survival FPS.
I recommend it because it is fast and simple: you start it, you choose a server: boom!  You're ready to kill zombies until level 10 (and restart) or you're done with it.
Nice, easy to understand, lots of servers and players, nice features.
It's a nice bang, boom, slash game.
Great game to play with some friends and just enjoy killing wave after wave of zombies while getting increasingly more powerful weapons all leading up to a final fight. Great game for a low price.

Awesome FPS multiplayer game!
Easy to run (any computer can run it), good graphics, great co-op, lots of fun!
If you like FPS multiplayer games, it's a fine addiction to your collection!
